remarks.format: ## Remarks 重写此方法应不视为基数相关的不匹配错误，并不应在这些情况下引发异常。Overrides of this method should not treat cardinality-related mismatches as errors, and should not throw exceptions in those cases. 例如，如果是且没有任何与指定的条件匹配的对象，空应返回集合。For example, if is and there are zero objects that match the conditions of the specified , an empty collection should be returned.
